titleStmt.title: A very lamentable and woful discours of the fierce fluds, whiche lately flowed in Bedford shire, in Lincoln shire, and iu [sic] many other places with the great losses of sheep and other cattel. The v. of October. Anno Domini 1570.
titleStmt.author: Tarlton, Richard, d. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long Shop adioyning vnto Saint Mildreds Churche in the Pultrye, by Iohn Allde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the long Shop adioyning vnto Saint Mildreds Churche in the Pultrye
